message.body:
Im going to buy these ones tomorrow: TGT's new CD, her perfume ($9), COD ps3 game ($40), GTA5 ps3 game ($40), and sonic game ($15)....
She also wanted a black soft leather handbag with a lot of pockets. That's going to be about $20-50 depending on which bag. I'm waiting to see what it is during the sale tom.
The rest are lil stocking stuffers ranging from $2-8.
Ight cod i like that one nd ight

Then Michael didn't really ask for anything. He doesn't know what he wants yet but is like you and likes surprises so you can pick him up anything you want to get him... I honestly just got him like 6 different dress shirts ($12-16) and 2 t-shirts about linguistics ($20 each)...
If you want to pick from my stuff I have them all upstairs to choose from.. or I can find you something else. Your choice
K just let me know... and ok ill save that one for Steph for you
